title: Crooning Crustaceans & Other Singing Animals 07.11.22
itunes:title: Crooning Crustaceans & Other Singing Animals 07.11.22
description:
In episode 1284, Jack and guest co-host DJ Danl are joined by comedians and hosts of Truth Hounds, Kyle Mizono and Anna Seregina to discuss... the dark history behind 'Where The Crawdads Sing', McGruff still being a thing and so much more!

 

  1. Did American conservationists in Africa go too far?
  2. 'Where the Crawdads Sing' May Be Connected to a Years-Old Murder in Africa
  3. LISTEN: McGruff's SMART KIDS Album
  4. LISTEN: Waters of March - Art Garfunkel

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
